import React from 'react' import { Item } from 'semantic-ui-react' const description = [ 'Cute dogs come in a variety of shapes and sizes. Some cute dogs are cute for their adorable faces, others for their', 'tiny stature, and even others for their massive size.', ].join(' ') const Posts = () => ( Cute Dog

{description}

Many people also have their own barometers for what makes a cute dog.

Cute Dog ) export default Posts
